chat.msg: Welcome!
hi, go under the bench toward the road.
Hi
Where do i need to go?
go west, until you reach the road.
Sure, i have reached the picnic
oh, you are very far.
Not too sure about that
Which direction should i take?
go on the log toward the flower stand.
I'm not sure what you mean
Which direction should i go now?
where are you?
I see the picnic
ok. cross the river on the log.
I'm not sure what you mean
Where do i have to go?
go up (north) and a little west.
Ok, i did it, i'm next to the branch
go around the big bush.
Not too sure about that
Which direction should i take?
circle the bush from the right.
Sure, i have reached the branch
which branch?
I'm not sure what you mean
Where should i go now?
what is found near the branch?
Awsome! as you said, i'm now near the branch
Are you still near the picnic?
Awsome! as you said, i'm now near the picnic
go on the blanket.
Not too sure about that
Where do i have to go?
did you pass near the dog?
I have already passed by the dog
step on the mat and go up north.
Awsome! as you said, i'm now near the picnic
go to the flower stand.
Not too sure about that
Where do i have to go?
go to the people on the bicycle
I have not been at the picnic yet
are you at the lower left side of the map?
I'm not sure what you mean
Which direction should i go now?
